text:
[Verse]
In the sky so bright
Stars are shining through
Falling from the night
Chasing dreams I knew

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the wind
Songs of secret tales
Round the moon we spin
Nighttime never pales

[Chorus]
Midnight starlight calling me
Dancing in the galaxy
Hearts in tune with our delight
Lost in endless night sky flight

[Verse 3]
Fireflies in sea
Glow like golden beams
Mystery unfolding free
In our nighttime dreams

[Bridge]
Hold on to the light
Let our hopes take flight
Shooting stars in sight
Everything feels right

[Chorus]
Midnight starlight calling me
Dancing in the galaxy
Hearts in tune with our delight
Lost in endless night sky flight
title: Midnight Starlight
